body.description: 1. Smart TV: SYLVOX TV with Android 11.0 system, with WiFi, and Wireless Connection, you can download your favorite applications. Collect your favorite content, you can browse tens of thousands of TV programs.2. Digital Video Disc combo, RV TV with built-in Digital Video Disc player, Suitable for DVD/VCD/CD disc, can recognize most regional discs, suitable for RV and yacht. With the AC power adapter, it can be used indoors. 3. With the HI-FI sound box speaker, can be connected with ceiling speaker or outside speaker. Integrated ASTC tuner, with digital noise reduction function.4. 4.2-in-1 remote control, SYLVOX Smart TV built-in intelligent Assistant, can control TV via IR/Wireless Connection.5. Multiple Protection Design: 12volt TV support DC 12v/24v (DC wide voltage 9V-32V) power supply, recoil protection (when the voltage changes sharply, it can become flat and will not damage the circuit), reverse connection protection (No short circuit even if the positive and negative terminals are reversed).6. Excellent Experience: RV TV built-in Digital Video Disc, integrated ASTC tuner, with USB, ARC&CEC, VGA port, cabinet speaker, minimal sound staining, reduced distortion, excellent broadband sound effect. 178°H/178°V ultra-wide viewing angle experience. With square bracket base, cigarette lighter, adapter, and other accessories.7. Use Place: Travel and home Both, suitable for traveling campers, trailers, RVs, and home bedrooms, kitchens, lounges, and other places. The included adapter converts the home AC power to DC power to power the TV, thereby achieving a home-use effect.8. Full High-definition Smart TV: Resolution 1920 x 1080 FHD picture quality, full high-definition LCD TV, ELED backlight, slim and lightweight body. High-performance 16: 9 aspect ratio LCD panel, 8-bit color panel with 16.7 million colors. Delivering a stunning picture experience. Frameless design for full-screen enjoyment.Specifications:Response Time (typical): 5msWireless Connection: 5.0 WiFi: Support 5GPorts: OPTICAL OUT*1, TV Tuner*2, LAN*1, CEC&ARC*2, Line (L/R) out*1, Earphone*1, USB*2Note: New TV screens come with a protective film, please remove the TV film before using the TV. Satisfaction Service: Sylvox is a brand of United state company, please contact SYLVOX support center for any after-sales issues to ensure satisfactory service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a TV for our Christmas vacation for our Motorhome so our kids could watch TV while traveling. Great investment to keep the peace! We received a remote that did not connect/work I contacted them thru email and they made sure we had a new one before we left for our trip. Great customer service and prompt responses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Happy With the Functions of this RV Television!
reviews.reviewText: I did much research before pulling the trigger on a new RV television, There are not many options in this realm, I needed it to be a Smart TV, and most importantly to me I needed to be able to have it connect to the Onboard Stereo System in the Camper. This is how this TV sets itself apart from the competition. The Stereo Audio Out Function is capable to Integrate with the Onboard Kenwood Stereo, allowing me to use the balance function of the stereo to put more sound to the passenger on the second bed and not have the TV blaring from the back of the unit into the upper sleeping quarters on a 2021 Artic Fox Truck Camper. Now we can all hear it at the levels we want even when the AC unit is blasting. Picture is Great, Set-up is a cinch, Remote is your standard smart remote similar to a Samsung, Even has a Sleep Timer! Delivery came quick, and after install I had questions about the unit and reached out to support and they were more than prompt and helpful to address any problems and quick to offer resolution. Very happy with customer support and my purchase and would recommend this unit to anyone in the RV world looking to upgrade their Television.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had problems setting this up to connect with my cable service and it took a dozen calls and 24 hours before anyone answered my call. Further, the phone number for support in all their literature is incorrect, and I was only able to get the call to be answered at all was via email. If it had not been for my son coming to my rescue, I'd still be waiting for further help because they asked me to send pictures so they could visualize the back of their TV and my cable box that I was trying to connect to. Picture and sound appear to be just fine, but don't expect a responsive support department (which is likely from another country). The support is the main reason I gave this only one star as I was ready to send this back just waiting to reach someone in support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I needed a 22" bedroom TV on a pedestal and this TV fits perfectly. Picture quality is great. Loving that it is a smart TV. Only drawback is the sound quality. Very "tinny". Even brought in my IT son to try to adjust the sound but we couldn't get away from the "tinny" sound. But that's okay. I can live with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great TV!
reviews.reviewText: We’re very happy with our new Sylvox tv. We bought it for our RV and it’s the perfect size for a small rv bedroom. We had a little issue with the AC adapter but Sylvox’s customer service immediately shipped us a new one. It’s ships with AC and DC adapters as well as an easy to use remote. If there’s something you can’t figure out on the remote, the tv manual is easy to understand. We highly recommend this tv👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Picture quality is good but the built in tuner sucks, it doesn't pick up many channels and the channels I do get are unwatchable as the quality is terrible. My old TV, which an insignia flat screen that's almost 15 years old, with the same antenna and in the same area gets twice as many channels. The speakers in this TV have a very tin sound. It sounds like they are just tweeters. My biggest issue with this TV is the input ports are recessed which means it's hard to plug things in and it's impossible to plug in a streaming stick unless it's pigtailed. So no antenna TV and no smart TV and my only options when boondocking are DVDs that are becoming harder to find even at the dollar store. Another thing is the build quality is lacking. bezel came undone a little bit in shipping and doesn't want to go back together buts it's subtle and not very noticeable so it's not a huge deal, but it just feels like cheap hard plastic. Overall this TV is kind of meh... If it wasn't 12v I wouldn't keep it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for rv
reviews.reviewText: Easy install and works great. nice to have a smart tv

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very slim for RV use.
reviews.reviewText: I’m having to repair the cable/antenna connector because it broke off in use. Also, it’s all Android, so Appleheads will have a learning curve.
